text: The Château de Meillant is a historic manor in Meillant, Cher, Centre-Val de Loire, France. ==History== It was built in the 15th century.French Ministry of Culture: Château de Meillant ==Architectural significance== It has been listed as an official monument since 1963. ==References== Category:Châteaux in Cher Category:Monuments historiques of Centre-Val de Loire
title: Château de Meillant
